abi: function calculateVotes(address _pool, uint256 _proposalId) view returns (uint256 yesVotes, uint256 noVotes, uint256 yesVoters, uint256 noVoters)
function createJoinProposal(address _user, uint256 _proposalId, string _title, string _description, uint256 _amount, uint256 _govTokens, address _paymentToken, address _govToken)
function createProposal(address _creator, uint256 _proposalId, string _title, string _description, address[] _contractAddresses, string[] _actions, bytes[] _params, uint256[] _transactionValues)

function getProposal(address _pool, uint256 _proposalId) view returns (string title, string description, uint256 transactionCount, uint256 deadline, uint256 yesVotes, uint256 noVotes, uint256 totalVotes, uint256 createdAt, bool executed, address creator)
function getProposalTransaction(address _pool, uint256 _proposalId, uint256 _transactionIndex) view returns (string action, bytes param, uint256 transactionValue, address contractAddress)
function getProposalTransactions(address _pool, uint256 _proposalId) view returns (string[] actions, bytes[] params, uint256[] transactionValues, address[] contractAddresses)
function hasVoted(address _pool, uint256 _proposalId, address _account) view returns (uint8)
function proposalExecutable(address _pool, uint256 _proposalId) view returns (bool executable, string errorMessage)
